feature.authors: Mussie Beian and Suzanne Dang and Mathieu Alloing and Romain Anankine and Edmond Cambril and Carmen Gomez and Johann Osmond and Aristide Lemaitre and Francois Dubin
feature.title: Dynamical control over the confinement of spatially indirect excitons in electrostatic traps of GaAs coupled quantum wells
